title: Samurai Soundtrack 100 Tracks
description: Samurai Soundtrack is a high-quality pack of 100 tracks for royalty-free use in video games, created by Bobby Cole.
longDescription:
"Nature Ambience" by Bobby Cole offers 100 royalty-free tracks of ambient music that evokes the peacefulness of natural settings. Ideal for projects that require a serene soundscape, this collection brings the soothing, tranquil vibes of the outdoors to any game or relaxation-focused application.


Listen to my Samurai Soundtrack Sampler here: https://soundcloud.com/bobbycole/samurai-soundtrack-sampler


Once you've purchased this pack, feel free to contact me directly at hello@bobbycole.co.uk. I'm available to provide additional services such as track adjustments, consultation to select the best-suited tracks for your game, and custom music composition, all for an additional fee.


This Mega Pack includes 100 tracks:

  • 5 hours of music
  • 100 original high-quality tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

Â 

Tracks details:

  • Audio sample rate: 44.1 kHz
  • Format: .wav
  • Bit depth: 16 bit
  • Loopable: No
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Ancient Silk Road
  • Ballad for the Last Dragon
  • Cherry Blossom in the Wind
  • China Tea Set
  • Claw of the Dragon
  • Crimson Light
  • Dragons Lullaby
  • Jade Falls
  • Macau Sunrise
  • Ming Dynasty Theme
  • Oriental Wave
  • and many more


Number of Audio Wavs: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 hours 28 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: bobbycole.co.uk
